start.speaker: guido
start.text: These teleports are starting to hurt my head...

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Welcome to Zanaris human, how did you manage to get here?

start.speaker: guido
start.text: I got a dramen staff from the professor and was told to go here next.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Aaaah... I see. What is it that you are looking for?

start.speaker: guido
start.text: I thought you would be able to tell me that.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Whatever makes you think that? I am just a sheep.

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Well Sinterklaas hired some gnome to put me on a treasure trail instead of just giving me my present.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: What is a Sinterklaas? Not some shepherd with a staff I hope?

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Well it just so happens that there are some eclectic implings flying around here.

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Rumor has it that they have a chance of dropping a clue scroll!

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: Well you look like you are an able hunter, who can catch these implings with his barehands!

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Is there really no other way...?

start.speaker: sheep
start.text: I'm afraid not, good hunting human!

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: Aaah! It seems like you managed to retrieve a new clue scroll from an impling!

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: HOW ARE YOU ABLE TO CARRY TWO CLUE SCROLLS??!

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Uuuhm.. I don't know? I simply opened the jar and got a new one.

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: Please hand it over to me so I can dispose of it.

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Are you sure I won't be needing this scroll as well?

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: Your new task is written on the new clue scroll, please hand it over.
You hand over the scroll and the sheep calms down

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: I'm afraid the implings can't leave Zanaris either, they steal all sorts of stuff from people. We don't want to get in trouble again.
You give the impling jars to the sheep. Good riddance.

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: Aaah now that that has been Swampleticsd, congratulations on obtaining your next step!

complete.speaker: sheep
complete.text: I wish you the best of luck, and say hi to the shepherd for me.
